website_summaries.verdict: This high-quality drain cleaner works great in toilets, showers, and sinks.
pros: Dissolves grease, hair, sludge and much more
Drain cleaner is odorless, non-flammable, and biodegradable
Features a high-density formula that ensures the drain cleaner is heavier than water and clings to a blockage to eliminate it
Intended for use with any household drain
cons: Works slowly in comparison to similar drain cleaners

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic stuff. My bathtub was so bad that when I showered I would be standing in almost a foot of water. I used other products all to no avail and was to the point of calling a plumber when I came across this product. Some of the reviews were negative so I didn't have much confidence that it would work when I ordered it. So glad that I did!! I used half the bottle and within a couple hours the clog was totally gone and no evil odor. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work for toilets
customer_reviews.text: I used it on one of our toilets that occasionally clogs and was flushing slowly when it did work. Left it in overnight and it seems to have done the trick. No clogs yet after a week and the flushes are now normal. I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Crutcher

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do anything at all  💸💸
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work at all. Water is still going down, but nothing thicker than water can be flushed. Tried dish soap & hot water for a few days, tried Drano & hot water for a few days, tried baking soda & vinegar, nothing. Ordered one bottle of this, followed instructions and poured both halves down toilet, left it alone and let it sit for well over 12 hours, hot water, nothing. Ordered another bottle, repeat, nothing. I’ve poured $24 down the drain for nothing. Argh. Snake won’t go but a foot or so in. Hopefully the plunger that is arriving today will do something. Sooooo frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Timbarina

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Will be buying again and again!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was amazing for fixing a slow running bathroom sink drain (my wife’s hair that falls out when brushing) and also shower/tub drain. Works fast, without any horrible chemical smell and 1 application (I think I used a half bottle) has lasted for 2 months without any additional applications! Really impressed and that’s rare. 5 star reviews from me are about as common as full size candy bars are on Halloween. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jokur

customer_reviews.title: 100% would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had a sink in my bathroom that would fill up when I was brushing my teeth. So I decided to buy a drain cleaner. When I find this drain cleaner in particular I was surprised by how cheap it is compared to its competitors. Since I'm really cheap I bought it anyways without questioning anything. The results were amazing. My sink is working perfectly the water is draining and not filling up like you used to. By the way even though the instructions said I was supposed to use one chamber I used the entire solution. I took some time at first but now my drain is clean. I recommended it to everyone. 5 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Gobena

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I had a stubborn toilet clog which neither my son nor I could clear with a plunger or a snake. I bought this product with hope...but ...skepticism. Used it the night I received it and when I flushed in the morning, nothing happened.....until I got back to my bedroom and heard the water go down!! I like to use "green" products that are effective. I'm sold on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Leland girl

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! This made my sink clog even worse. My sink was at least slowly draining before, but now it won't drain at all. Very frustrating. There's a whole bottle sitting in my sink, and it's been over a day. Nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey A Knight

customer_reviews.title: Made issue worse
customer_reviews.text: It was slow draining so I decided to do something before it got worse. I bought this and now nothing drains at all. I now have a sink full of water that hasn’t gone down even an inch within the last 12 hours. EDIT: My review stays the same because the product did not work. However, I was kindly contacted by the seller and given a full refund, as guaranteed. The seller noted that the product does not work for 85% of clogs. This is meant to be used for general maintenance it seems and not to fix already clogged drains.
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: Please don't buy this product it does not work no matter what the reviews say!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product to anyone it couldn't even unplug laundry room sink! $12 gone down the tubes. As far as the money back guarantee on the bottle that's crap. I think for your money 7 minutes Liquid-Plumr in the blue bottle is 10 times better then this crap I'm glad I didn't buy it off TV off the commercial it's more expensive on the commercial. I understand some of the reviews said that it works. Wrong if it can't unclog of laundry room sink then it's not much good for anything else. Please don't buy this product no matter what the reviews say about it it's garbage!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Green Gobbler DISSOLVE Liquid Hair and Grease....
customer_reviews.text: Takes awhile to remove stubborn shower drain clogs, but, if you wait a day, your drain will be cleared without too much hazardous residue to clean up. Don't get it on your skin, however. It is not as gentle as they say it is.
customer_reviews.author: Tina the S.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: DISSOLVE is the BEST EVER
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has waist length hair, and it plugged up both bathroom shower drains. We put much less product than called for into the drains and followed directions....the Green Gobbler DISSOLVE got rid of the clogs and they flowed freely. A wonderful product that every household should have. It was unreal the speed it cleaned up what had been a mess for months...!
customer_reviews.author: Gram_watts

customer_reviews.title: Now I know to pass on any drain cleaner that doesn't clearly label it's active ingredient.
customer_reviews.text: Turned my very slow drain into standing water. I followed the directions exactly on both applications. The proprietary formula nonsense on the back in place of an ingredients list means my next step will be a crapshoot of chemical reactions. I have no way to tell if adding Draino or Liquid plumber will damage my pipes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this product is supposed to be used to unclog a toilet. But it did and it worked within 30 minutes. Happy!Happy!
customer_reviews.author: JJJ

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED PRODUCT AND BOX
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this. My toilet has been overflowing for a week and I searched for what seemed like a relatively safe but effective product. Upon opening the box today, I blindly grabbed the bottle and immediately noticed the bottle was soaked. I looked at the inside of the box and there was a battery acid looking puddle of product on the box and bottle. One of the caps was almost fully off and there was no thin protective layer inside keeping the liquid in the bottle. I ran to grab a towel to wipe the bottle down and washed my hands since I didnt know what it would do. This was a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Calimlim

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works!! Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok....so I have to do a little review on this product BECAUSE I have had a stopped up kitchen sink and have LITERALLY tried EVERYTHING down to the industrial products...with NO luck....I decided to go on Amazon and read a few reviews....this is the one I decided to go with....I only used one chamber, let it sit for an hour, then used boiling water.... my sink is NO LONGER stopped up!!! Saved a plumber bill and this was $11.97....HUGE win for this woman!!
customer_reviews.author: Tabpeach

customer_reviews.title: Just Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a simple bathroom drain clog TWICE. Second half of the bottle overnight. NO CHANGE in the clog and this sink is rarely used so it can't be a major hair or other stuff in the way. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Healey

customer_reviews.title: Worthless product.  Grab a soda.
customer_reviews.text: Toilet been clogged for a week. Needs to be plunged violently after every flush to get water and whatever else down. Bought this used entire bottle let it sit overnight 12 hours about. Had to plunge it down. Toilet still clogged or pipe is full of crud I dont Know. Remember a tip that Coca Cola (any dark soda) left overnight in toilet bowl will clean it from all the acid. Had a can of Diet Coke so i poured in toilet and let it sit for a couple hours. Flush toilet it’s brand new. Last 4 flushes go down like a dream regardless of load. This product was garbage did nothing. 1 can of Diet Coke fixed my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Joey D

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work!!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this a few days ago. I pour half the bottle, waited 3 hrs and flushed the drain with hot water. The clog still was there. I poured the remaining of the bottle into the drain, waited overnight and issue still persist. So I went and brought Drano Max Gel, poured it in the drain, waited 1 hr, flushed with hot water and VIOLA!!!! Issue resolved. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY if you have hair clogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that the bottle is conveniently divided into ...
customer_reviews.text: I found that this product was able to clear out a very sluggish drain that the normal products simply had little effect on. I went through several bottles of the brand name products from the grocery store and was beginning to think that I might have to pay for a plumber, when I discovered the "Green Gobbler" products. After one application overnight, as per the directions, and the drain was completely cleared. In addition to its effectiveness, I love the fact that the bottle is conveniently divided into the recommended amounts, thus avoiding trying to estimate how much to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mad About My Maltese

customer_reviews.title: Simply worked!
customer_reviews.text: I had a sink backing up into the tub next to it so I poured one side into the tub and one side into the sink and gave it an hour to sit. Then ran VERY hot water down the sink (as it is higher in elevation) and a ball of "yuck" came out in the tub. I pulled that out and ran more hot water down the tub and sink and repeated it a few times now both drain easily as expected. I would recommend this product, as it was easy to use, no smell, and worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: S. Vertner

customer_reviews.title: No change after using both sides of the bottle on a single clog.
customer_reviews.text: We have a septic tank and a toilet which was flushing very slowly. I tried to aggressively plunge the toilet first, but that didn't work. I bought this stuff, because it is septic safe. However, it being septic safe doesn't help me if it doesn't work. Poured both sides of the bottle into the toilet, left it overnight, then flushed it the following morning...No change..I thought it needed to go deeper into the drain, so we refrained from using the toilet for another day, then flushed again with no change. Repeated the flush & wait process one more time, and again, no change. It says it's guaranteed to work, so I'll be asking for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This truly works!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!!! I have tried to clear up my bathroom sink drain for months now. Drano half bottle, drano full bottle, this drano and that drano. I've tried baking soda and vinegar a few times. Nothing cleared it enough. After brushing my teeth I was left with a sink of water that went down very slowly. I put into the drain one section of GREEN GOBBLER DISSOLVE for 12 hours. After 12 hours of no use I poured in boiling water and let it sit for half an hour. GREAT PRODUCT!! My drain is completely clear. I tried filling up the sink which usually took 30 seconds but now the water kept going down!!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Ended up using Drano
customer_reviews.text: My sink was completely blocked. I used the entire bottle, in two attempts. It opened a tiny enough hole that the sink drained after an hour. Drano opened my sink in 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Booklover

customer_reviews.title: Did the job as promised
customer_reviews.text: The bathroom sink that I use when brushing my teeth and shaving had been draining slowly for a while and finally became almost fully stopped up. At 4pm the day I got the Green Gobbler Dissolve, I filled the problematic sink with hot water and waited for most of it to drain and then poured in the Green Gobbler dissolve. At 9am the next morning I poured 3 cups of boiling water down the drain. It disappeared quickly. Then I ran water from the tap. No water collected; all went right down the drain. Job well done, Green Gobbler. I will use this product again if I need it and will confidently recommend it to other people.
customer_reviews.author: Froth

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: In all the years I have owned my home and all of the products we have purchased to unclog sinks, toilets and tubs, this is the first that has actually worked the first time and everytime. Use as directed and the problem is gone. Great stuff. Only one problem, it arrived in a box with other orders and had spewed out terribly from both sides. Needs to be packaged more carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Lane

customer_reviews.title: Guaranteed to work.... did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Well it didn't work. I guess it's not going to work every time. I emailed support@greengobbler email to try their money back guarantee. Apparently that email address does not exist (odd) and the only way to get my money back would be to call their 800 number during working hours, when I am busy and have things to do. So that has to be a 1/5 star right? If I have to call a 800 number, probably sit there on hold, probably have to call back multiple times (usually how it works on the phone) then it isn't worth my time to try to get $10 back. At least the product doesn't stink and isn't thick and gooey.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Just go ahead and get it
customer_reviews.text: I have a tub that hasn't drained properly for months. To the point that you're standing in 4-5 inches of water when you finish your shower. I've tried everything, saw the reviews for this and thought if this doesnt work it's either dynamite or a plumber. I followed the directions and left the shower alone for several hours then put in the boiling water. Still seemed to be draining slow, back to Amazon to look for dynamite...the next morning my husband is taking a shower...no cussing, no plunging, hmmm... IT WORKED!!! for the first time in months its draining. It's now been a few weeks still draining. Problem solved. Get this product, it works.
customer_reviews.author: IY59

customer_reviews.title: 100+ Old clogged sink
customer_reviews.text: My handyman really gagged my slop sank in the basement. I have a very old house with olde pipes and I was trying hot water and dawn and plunging No way ....so I gave this a try and it works Great no muss or fuss not toxic and it totally cleared the sink love this and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Laur

customer_reviews.title: It does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Used it according to instructions, flushing toilet and then after it refilled carefully adding the liquid in 2 bottles. Waited 5.5 hours, flushed and it remained the same. Waited 8 more hours and still nothing happened. Conclusion, it just doesn't work. I would recommend buying anything else. I gave it 1 star since there wasn't anything lower. FYI: the toilet was just running slow, the water pressure was ok, and it's still running slow while draining.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sand

customer_reviews.title: Product not working.
customer_reviews.text: Hello, As I stated online at Amazon your product did not work as advertised. My drain got worse after putting the 1st bottle in. It appeared to start to drain, but I run the water and drain line fills up then I wait every 2 hrs and it drains, but the drain doesn't run free for long. I did the baking soda and vinegar and that seemed better than your product. If you want to send me another pak to try, I would accept it. Product is not working as described
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Stainbrook

customer_reviews.title: Didn't clear my clog
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this did not clear my clogged drain at all. I followed the directions exactly and my drain is still clogged. Water runs slowly but it's the same as it was before I used this. I was really hoping something more natural would work. I am skeptical as there are tons of warnings on the bottle about getting it on your clothes and skin and to wash skin for 15 minutes if it gets on your skin. That doesn't sound very gentle. There are no ingredients listed on the bottle either. Who knows what is really in it! I wish I did as I am worried about using another drain cleaner after it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work at all for us. I followed the directions exactly. First poured down the drain slowly, let it sit for about an hour and a half, flushed with hot water. Nothing happened, still had a slow-flowing drain. I then tried letting it soak overnight and used really hot water. The same result nothing happened. No improvement was a total waste of money. I don't know how there are so many positive reviews on this product as I might as well poured water down my drain. I would have had the same result but would have saved $12.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Dumped this and my money down the drain!
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing more than hot soapy water would have done by itself!🤬 To punctuate my annoyance one side had almost NO liquid & the “nice” little Indian fellow refused to send me a replacement! I have ordered more than 500 items from BezosWorld in 2018 & nearly 400 so far in 2019 ~ I see that number will need to start creeping down to ZERO next year ~ the company clearly doesn’t want my money any more!
customer_reviews.author: Lionel Verney

customer_reviews.title: Worked somewhat **and then it didn't**
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom sink is draining slowly and I had already used a plastic snake on it that didn't really help much. I was really hoping this would do the trick after reading all of the positive reviews. I poured one side down the drain as it said to do, and let it sit overnight, then flushed with hot water the next morning. It did help. It doesn't drain as slow now, but it didn't clear it completely. **4/26/19** The little bit it did work didn't last long. I used the second side, but it didn't help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on our clogged tub.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on the reviews. I used it for a shower/tub drain. Our drain has that stupid pop up closure so you can't snake it. So I got tired of buying Drano all the time. I searched for a better product and based on the reviews, I thought this might be it. I poured one side and left it overnight, then poured a large pot of boiling water, slowly down the drain. No change. I did the second half of the container the next night. Still no change. I would have to say for tub clogs, don't buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: volvomom

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all in my tub. I used one bottle and then a second one I left in overnight. I turned on the hotwater and it was still clogged. Says guaranteed, can I get a refund?
customer_reviews.author: Dommy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Plumber told me that there was a clog - foodstuff, nothing weird - a bit further down the pipe... this did not live up to its promise. I used hot water, had it stand for multiple hours etc... NOTHING. I admit i did not try it overnight, so that could be on me, and that's why I'm giving it two stars and not 1. Which if it worked overnight, it would have gotten 3 or 4 stars... cause of how it's hyped like it works. When it didn't for me. So there you have it.
customer_reviews.author: MsTerry

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter put an entire roll of toilet paper in our toilet and this didn't do the trick for me. The other reviews are very high on it for other functions, just know it didn't dissolve a thick roll of charmin that had been flushed by my 6-year-old. Ultimately had to get a plumber out after try this, a traditional plunger and a different style plunger that pushes the clog down. Not sure anything could do the trick for my toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works and Doesn't Have Nasty Fumes
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, and didn't require special eye covering, gloves or a face mask. I did use both bottles in order to get the clog to completely clear. Used one bottle and let it sit for a couple hours and then rinsed. Did the second bottle and let it sit over night. When I showered in the morning, the water drained as it is supposed to. Pleased that it works and doesn't poison me in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Dunning

customer_reviews.title: Call a plumber, and save yourself a lot of grief, time, and extra expense.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product zero stars, were that possible. I actually used six applications - three bottles – over the course of about 18 days on a thoroughly recalcitrant clog behind my kitchen sink. Followed all instructions to the letter. Not only did this magic formula fail to clear my drain pipe, but it made the situation demonstrably worse! Beware! The only refund I was able to obtain was in kind; in other words, the company sent me three replacement bottles at no expense to myself. Great! Anyone want to buy some magic formula cheap? Caveat emptor!
customer_reviews.author: wisconsinite

customer_reviews.title: I wish it worked, but it didn't clear my tub drain
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this didn't work for us. Our bathtub slows down significantly every few months due to several females with long hair. I decided to give this a try, I usually use another product that works, but liked the "green" aspect of this. I poured one side in, let it sit for several hours, flushed it with very hot water and no change in flow. I poured in the other side, left it overnight and poured boiling water down in the morning. The flow improved minimally. I went back to my usual product and the drain was clear in 15min. I wanted to love this, but it just didn't work. I'm thankful that they guarantee their product.
customer_reviews.author: SeibelK

customer_reviews.title: it works......it really does
customer_reviews.text: had a bathroom sink that always ran slow.....always. had to unclog it on a regular basis, or rather, my husband did. This product seemed like a better solution, so i tried it. left it in overnite, poured some hot water in the drain the following morning. and its clear!!!! very nice surprise. i am going to use this on a regular basis to keep this drain running much clearer. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: francie5

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I have quit Drano for good after using GreenGobbler! It was recommended to me by a friend. I know that Drano is bad for your pipes, so I liked that this was a natural de-clogger. When I used it in my completely clogged bathtub drain, it worked like a dream! This is a small company. A real person emailed me asking if the product worked for me, reminding me of their money-back guarantee. I just purchased more to have on hand in case the need arises. And I just learned this company has lots of other natural cleaning products, too! I will be trying several of them! Happy to support this awesome company.
customer_reviews.author: Allison B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pricey but did the trick with boiling water
customer_reviews.text: I've had a sink issue at my apartment where years of clogging must have been built up. I used the suggested dosage (1 full half) and then let it sit for 3-4 hours. After that, I took around a gallon of boiling water and dumped it down the drain (be careful!). It's significantly better now - much better than DranEx (?) did for me. Two cons: 1. The price is actually quite a bit higher than other brands. I'm wondering why. 2. Each bottle only gives you 2 uses Overall: Very worth it. I used a half on my troublesome sink and half on my "ok" tub. No real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So this was on a list of best products to buy and I was having trouble getting our guest Baths bathtub to drain well. I used both bottles in that drain and left it for about 36 hours before putting water down the drain. It helped significantly but didn’t totally fix the problem. To be fair though, we had a professional plumber come out for another reason and they even struggled to fix that drain. But it did help a lot so for that reason I give it 5 stars. We actually ordered 2 more to have on hand just in case. FYI it says it can burn your skin so I did use latex gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews, I really hoped this product would work for a club in my bathtub. I saw other reviewers had bad clogs like mine, where the water was taking all day to drain. I poured the product down the drain in the evening and the following morning flushed it with hot water. It drained a little bit, however, the clog still remains as water started to fill the tub again. I gave it two stars as opposed to one because the water is at least draining a little, but not completely. I will update my review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Nat_G

customer_reviews.title: Works every time!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I always hesitate to buy it because it's more expensive than the other stuff. However, I recently bought a giant bottle of the other stuff and treatment after treatment (3 in total), the clog was only turned to a slow drain and then would just return. Only one treatment in a slow shower drain with Dissolve and the clog is completely gone. It doesn't smell, I don't have to put on rubber gloves to use it, and it actually works. I end up saving money because I only have to do it once and each bottle comes with two treatments. Definitely the best drain cleaner out there.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: They changed the seal, it's now plastic and breaks in shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is really sad but I'm pretty sure they changed the seal on this product. I've ordered it in the past, and there were multiple layers of the seal (from what I remember, a small cardboard piece and foil). This time, the seal was a thin layer of plastic only. When I received the product, BOTH bottles had spilled all inside the shipping box... there was corrosive liquid everywhere! I don't want to touch the bottles at all, they literally have dried liquid all over them. The product works, but, there's no way this new seal is viable for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Champ
customer_reviews.text: We have septic out here in the country and I want to be more careful than in the past about what I put down the drains since healthy cultures are needed for a good Septic. I gave Green Gobbler a try on a slow running bathroom sink that hot water treatments could only take so far. It worked like a champ and now runs freely and I have confidence that after having the septic recently cleaned and adding new cultures it is still working well. A+ for the right tool at the right time!
customer_reviews.author: David K. Carpe

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: We have three teens using one bathroom and two of them have long hair. The drain stoppers won't come loose so I can't manually remove the hair. They recently complained about a slow drain in the tub so I tried this for the first time. I poured half in the tub and the the other half in the two sinks. I waited probably 12 hours before running hot water. The drains are flowing great again. I would buy this again. It didn't have a chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lady K

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I have a clogged toilet due to my daughter's poop. I used this product as per the instructions. But this product did not work. Not cheap and does not deliver what they promise unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Android

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING....
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING!! I tried EVERYTHING to get my sink unclogged, but NOTHING worked. I read the reviews and decided to try it as a last resort before I called a plumber. I poured one bottle down the drain and let it set overnight. Woke up the next morning ran some hot water down the drain and my heart sank, because it started to fill up, but THEN just seconds later it was a vacuum sucked the water out. I hadn't heard the noise of an unclogged drain in so long I almost got a little emotional. 😆😆😆 It's worth EVERY penny. I don't know what's in this stuff, but I promise you....IT WORKS!!
customer_reviews.author: She_Got_Juice

customer_reviews.title: Bummed it didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Poured the pre-measured dose down the tub, waited 30 min, flushed with hot water, and I was disappointed to see the tub was still clogged. Product had no smell and looked very liquidy compared to previous drain cleaners I've used in the past. Read that for difficult clogs to pour the second pre-measured dose in, wait over night and flush with boiling water, did that and still no success unblocking the clog. It's just my fiance and myself in the home, and we've used other drain cleaners in the past and they've destroyed the block in the tub with no issue. I wanted to go more eco friendly but I need something that works. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Roger S

customer_reviews.title: Made my drain worse!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I've ever bought from Amazon! My tub has been draining really slow so I thought I would try this brand since it had good reviews and no strong smell. Well I did everything it asked and even dumped in super hot water when it was done, per instructions and my tub won't drain at all now!!! At least before it was draining, now I can't even take a shower and have to call a plumber to come fix this. I'm so disappointed I wasted my money and am now worse off now then before.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I used to unclog the drain in the bathroom sink as water was backing up when I was doing my morning shave. After pouring most of one side of the container down the drain and then following it up with water after a lengthy wait (hours) the drain is much better. I followed up with the balance of the one side a few days later and added some hot water after about 10 minutes. The water is now flowing smoothly and not backing up in the sink. I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Dragoncat

customer_reviews.title: Your better choice over the "other" drain cleaners!
customer_reviews.text: We had a shower/tub that was slow draining get up to our ankles while showering. I ordered this and used 1/2 the bottle as directed and let it sit for for about an hour then ran filled up the tub with some hot water pulled the drain plug and it cleared it in no time flat. Drain runs like a champ now. Great product and having used the other "professional" drain cleaners I was pleasantly surprised how well it worked.
customer_reviews.author: FLSHADOW74

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me and the seller did not refund my money.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all and my bath tub that has a slow drain. I waited 24 hours both times and poured boiling hot water down the drain and received no results. The company asks that you request your money back from them before you put up a review. I did request my money back and receive no response from the seller. So, the product did not work for me and the money back guarantee is a crock.
customer_reviews.author: T. MCDONALD

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used Green Gobbler Drain Opening Pacs for the first time in 3 drains (shower, bathroom sink and kitchen sink) and the toilet. This house was originally a bungalow, built around 1930, with minimal upgrading on the plumbing. Before Green Gobbler, the toilet often needed multiple flushing to fully clear the bowl and the drains were a bit on the slow side. I have lived here for 40 years and am wildly impressed with the improvement! We will only use Green Gobbler products from now on, and are pleased to recommend this product without reservation. Customer Support was also friendly, helpful, and quick to respond to questions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY thing that worked!
customer_reviews.text: I tried Drano AND Liquid Plummer several times over. I'm talking like 3 or so different occasions to unclog my sink and bathtub. Neither worked ever at all after following close instructions. I looked up other products on Amazon, read the reviews on this one and took a chance. Fast forward one bottle later and the clog is completely GONE. I followed the instructions exactly and this stuff worked like magic. I'm now a fan, and this will be the product I go to from now on when in need of unclogging a drain. GREAT product!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: May work as a preventative
customer_reviews.text: What a waste. I spent $25 for two bottles, based on glowing reviews, and neither bottle did anything. Directions state that this will work in standing water. It did not. Just before using Green Gobbler, I had poured in a mix of boiling water, vinegar and baking soda, so, if anything that should have loosened the clog to help. I even poured boiling water after the gobbler, still no difference. In good faith, I can only reccommend this as a method of prevention. I do what I can for the envoirnment but sometimes a good ol bottle of $8 Drano, is whats needed.
customer_reviews.author: Is

customer_reviews.title: Use HOT water, be patient, no odor
customer_reviews.text: The best part: no stinky harsh chemical smell that stings the nose and lingers for hours. Con: a bit expensive for what you get (2 doses). Read the directions. Run HOT water, not almost hot warm water. Pour green gobbler. Wait 2 or more hours, or overnight. Flush with some HOT water. Wait a while. Flush fully with HOT water one more time, and hear the water gurgle down clear pipes. HOT water and patience are KEY, a must. Worked really well on all our drains. Be patient, and it should work nicely with hot water. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: SoCalWave

customer_reviews.title: The BEST product and customer service ever!  THANK YOU! A++++++
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to unclog my bathroom sink. My sink was so clogged it would not even slow drain. After I tried everything and nothing worked I figured I would need a plumber and set up an appointment. My friend then recommended this product and I followed super easy instructions and it unclogged my sink and it has stayed unclogged. I was able to cancel the plumber appointment. I am so happy and this product does miracles! Also to mention the BEST customer service team ever. Thank you so very much!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Swan

customer_reviews.title: Worked but took it’s time
customer_reviews.text: My clogged bathroom sink is now 75% unclogged thanks to this product. After following the instructions, I wasn’t too happy with the result for the first two days - while the sink seemed unclogged the flow was still slow with water backing up slowly. I was about to give a 2 star rating but decided to wait a couple of days ... it definitely seems to have gotten better now with water flowing more freely and barley backing up. Would have given 5 stars if it unclogged fully on the first attempt.
customer_reviews.author: Ramachandra Srivatsa

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Easy and effective clearing of clogged bathroom sink drain. I poured one chamber's worth into drain through standing water before I went to bed. In the morning, no standing water, and the hot water I ran down the drain flowed freely. I like that the bottle is divided into two chambers. With other brands having two applications in a bottle, I was never quite sure when I'd poured out half a bottle. Second application is unopened and on hand for future use. I live in an older house with old pipes and appreciate the green claims.
customer_reviews.author: H2Ouzel

customer_reviews.title: Not convinced
customer_reviews.text: I saw all the incredible ratings, and decided to try it. I have multiple drains in my home that are slow due to having long haired women and dogs clogging them up. I've tried multiple brands and nothing really solved the issue. After pouring DISSOLVE down each of those drains, I let them sit for about an hour. I used a utility line to pour really hot water down those drains to ensure all the debris would wash away. After all that, I didn't notice any difference in how well they drained. The search continues.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 2 stars because it is pre-measured and had no offensive scent but..... it didn't work. My shower drain does in fact drain, just slowly. I keep a hair catcher but over the past few months, hair has gotten past and is semi-clogged. I used one application, let it sit for a few hours (directions said the longer the better, but a minimum of 15-30 min) and then poured about 8 gallons of hot water down. The next morning, I go to take a shower and the water was actually going down even slower??? So I'm going to say this backfired. Going to try snaking then a stronger clog dissolver I guess.
customer_reviews.author: abigail

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you'll be glad you did!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best. easiest drain cleaner I've ever used. I especially like the pre-measured bottle, that makes it so easy, there's no need to measure anything, you just open the bottle an pour in down the drain. I let it set a couple hours, poured hot water down the drain, then poured the 2nd 'dose" down the drain and let it work all night. In the morning I rinsed it with the hottest water that would come out of the tap. It now works the best it has in the 18 years that I've lived in this house!
customer_reviews.author: R. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! My bathroom sink was so badly clogged. I read online about enzyme cleaners and looked them up on Amazon. I placed the product in the drain, waited awhile and poured a cup of boiling water in the drain and it's working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Real review

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Poured in the first portion. Left it for hours. Poured boiling water down the drain. After emptying half a kettle 's worth of water, brown water started bubbling up and would not drain down. Cried. Poured in second batch, it did go past the standing water and went down the drain. Left it over night. Basically, it took repeated kettles of boiling water, poured down the drain, throughout the day, to get the drain to slowly drain. Eight hours. I think there isn't enough product to break up a clogged drain or else it isn't strong enough?
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Finally found something that actually works for clogs...
customer_reviews.text: Wow.... I had about two inches of standing water in the shower while in use.... The tub drained really slow.... I read some reviews and decided to try Green Gobbler... I poured the measured contents of the bottle totally into the drain overnight. The next day as per directions I poured boiling HOT water down the drain... Wife thought I was crazy....using her tea kettle to boil the water... After a couple of boiling kettles of water the bathtub drain is draining faster than ever.... Very happy. I had my doubts and, they were proven wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Gustave

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Hi My shower drains very slowly so after viewing the commercial videos, I thought it would be something good to try. When I opened the box, there was some staining inside from the bottle. I followed the direction, using one chamber and left it for 30 minutes. Result was no change. I used the second chamber and left the solution overnight (as instructed on the container) but there was no improvement. I might give it another try at a later date.
customer_reviews.author: s shen

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised.
customer_reviews.text: My first experience with this product: it is absolutely fantastic. Used it to unclog my bathroom sink which had some gunk on it that was unidentifiable to me (pulling some of it out looked like black mud odorless. I am a guy with short hair). Left it overnight poured some close to boiling water early in AM as recommended and voila! Magic. The sink now empties completely even with the faucet at full run. Very happy. I did not see a label stating its safety for septic tanks so I’ll add a comment if I find a problem. First impression? Absolutely would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Luis F.

customer_reviews.title: I don’t believe in this product!
customer_reviews.text: We used first bottle and wait for 5 hours then we poured 6 qt pot of boiled water then wait for 30 minutes before using the bath tub but nothing was changed. Following the instructions, I poured another bottle and waited overnight (around 10 hours) without using our bath tub, then pour boiled water again and waited for 30 minutes before using the tub. Everything was still the same. We were still got slow water running down. Note that I did snake trap and clean up all the hairs before using these bottles. It’s $12.80 with tax so I hope people won’t waste their money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Quang

customer_reviews.title: Works just as advertised. They offer a full refund but that wont be necessary.
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it say it does- there are no exaggerations in the description. I used it on a toilet that had regular backup issues and required regular plunging. I poured the contents into the toilet and let is sit about 8 hours. It now worlds like a brand new toilet and my house is 25 years old. The flushes are quick and complete. Great product as advertised- I will be orders another bottle for my other toilet and some sluggish shower sinks drains. Well worth the price. Stuart
customer_reviews.author: Stuart schatz

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work At All
customer_reviews.text: I tried other solutions and hoped that they could help with my drain, and so far, after 3 different products, I tried this one. Well, it didn't work at all, and I'm still stuck with a drain that is going very slow, and am not sure what to do besides call a plumber at this point. This is unfortunate for me in many ways, but I thought this was the key. Nope. Didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Alberto Orduna SR.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really work well
customer_reviews.text: My slow drain moved a little more quickly, but it wasn't completely resolved. Liquid plumr's slow drain worked better. (Note: it appears that most people flush the chemical with bath water, which is cold. I usually go with a separate kettle of hot water, and that works better. Even with this, liquid plumr worked better).
customer_reviews.author: Alex Leung

customer_reviews.title: After 4 other brands failed, this one worked!
customer_reviews.text: Product worked as desired. Over the course of several weeks I had tried 3 other well known brands of drain openers on my tub, as well as buying a new plunger and plunging the heck out of it, plus several home remedies (liquid soap, etc.) with no success. After pouring in both containers of this cleaner, i waited overnight, poured a pot of almost-boiling water in, and within seconds heard a kind of "burp" deep in the drain, and the water in the tub went down. Afterwards I was able to shower and wash my hair without any water collecting in the tub. I advise buying an extra to keep on hand for future clogs if you have long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ali oops!

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my God I tried everything on the market trying to get rid of the clog in my bathroom sink. Gave this a first dose and followed with boiling water, nothing. Then I took the advice of other people poured the 2nd dose in and left it overnight. Was boiling water to follow up and the morning, but I needed to brush my teeth so I ran the water in the sink, cold water mind you, then it all went down!!! No more clogged sink!!! This stuff is amazing, and very reasonable and also easy to use! Highly recommend it! I've already ordered my 2nd bottle just to keep on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Holly S. Zassenhaus

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised it didn't help
customer_reviews.text: I am sure that in some instances this stuff really works. I don't know why but in my case it made my bathtub drain worse. I didn't expect that. I followed the directions to a tee. Besides that, though, it's nice because it doesn't smell awful and the bottle design is genius. So easy to use. Sure wish I'd had good results. However, this product is guaranteed by the manufacturer and I called for a refund. They say my purchase price on Amazon will be refunded back to my credit card, so I hope, and I believe, I will receive my refund shortly. The woman on the phone from New York was very courteous. It's a family owned business.
customer_reviews.author: tm

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item in box (1 of 2)
customer_reviews.text: Just writing to let you know that when the driver handed me the box the box was wet, she handed me it with the wet part in her hand she should have mentioned to me that the item was damaged. And no she was not wearing her mask when she got out of the truck. I am not going to return one of the item(s) that was damaged, it still looks like it can be used. Just letting you know that the driver should have mentioned to me the damaged product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda L. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Everything you've dreamed of in an unclogger
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do, unclog drains. I have very long, thick and wavy hair that gets stuck in my shower drain. I constantly have a slow drain, and had one for a year because I was too forgetful to do something about it. I bought this brand for the first time and it worked great. I needed to use both applications, but I am not surprised. There was probably a whole wig's worth in that drain. I'm impressed it even got it with two applications.
customer_reviews.author: Briannaandcheese

customer_reviews.title: Fixed what seemed to be un-fixable
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 5🌟 on the scent too since it was oder-less, which is awesome when it comes to cleaners that usually smell toxic to do the same job. We tried cleaning the trap in my bathroom sink, using draino, using good ol’ baking soda and vinegar. Nothing worked and it would pool easily and take forever to drain. I poured in the cleaner and left it over night. When I woke, I poured boiling water down the drain. This stuff worked wonders. It now actually drains!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Page

customer_reviews.title: Works great! - BUT ALWAYS SOAK OVERNIGHT + BOILED WATER
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great, better than I expected. Only problem I have is the instruction. Like many reviewer as suggested, the "first treatment" doesn't work that well unless you do soak it overnight THEN use boiled water to flush down. This thing comes with two treatments, so basically the instruction is leading you to waste half of your money but mislead you with first treatment. With that being said, it's a great product if you follow the "advance treatment" procedure (again, soak overnight + boiled water).
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: It came, it saw, it conquered!
customer_reviews.text: Stuck Kitchen drain in the time of Corona. We had used 4 bottles of regular clog products D-brand. No progress. We had pretty much decided to abandon the sink until the lockdown was over to avoid calling a plumber. Ordered a slew of products off of Amazon as a hail-mary. We poured treatmentA in at about 8pm. Followed by boiling water at 8am the next day (per GG instructions). At around 1pm, the most wonderful gurgling sound happened as the dam broke. (Elapsed time 20 hours) The 3 week old clog was clear and we reclaimed the use of our kitchen without violating social distancing. Hooo-ray! thank you Green Gobbler.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mccollum

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and effective
customer_reviews.text: We had a slow kitchen drain that often back up if open water for a while, probably too much grease underneath. I ordered this twin pack. Used the first portion, following instruction, let it sit for 30-min then dumped in boiling hot water. It worked to some degree, but the kitchen drain is still not fast enough. I then, followed the instructions, used the second portion overnight, and woke up early to dump boiling hot water. It completely solved the problem. Now the kitchen drain works like it is brand new. Bottomline, it saved me a lot of money, is very simple, easy to use, and is very effective.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Helpful but not a cure for severe clogs
customer_reviews.text: It couldn't do the job by itself, but helped. I may have asked too much of it because I had a clog so bad that the strength of 2 people plunging from both sinks couldn't make things move. This product made the blockage soft enough that a drum auger finally got water flowing. I can say that this product made the pipes very clean, though. Perhaps what it could be better used as would be a preventive measure, before a block gets too severe.
customer_reviews.author: Moira Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and it works too!
customer_reviews.text: Used the first chamber in July 2019 on a stubborn bathtub drain that chronically clogs up. I live with three girls and the amount of hair they shed is insane. The first time I used liquid plumber AND draino on back to back days because the drain wouldn’t unclog. I figured I would try this stuff before calling a plumber to snake the pipe. One overnight treatment and the drain was unclogged until today (Feb 2020). I’m impressed. This time the drain I only waited 15 minutes (vs overnight) before pouring boiling water down and it unclogged immediately. Definitely getting another bottle for standby!
customer_reviews.author: Dawge

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my clogged kitchen sink. I ordered another cleaner, but bought this because it was an Amazon's Choice and I could get it faster. I followed the directions. After 30 minutes, I flushed it with boiling water. No difference. I put the second dose in and waited overnight. Flushed it again and still a clog. I got the other drain cleaner and used it. Worked like a charm. Don't waster your money on this product for kitchen sinks.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Scent? Who cares?
customer_reviews.text: We had a pretty backed up shower that wouldnt unclog for the longest time. As instructed we threw half this stuff in there and waited over night and then put down a pot of boiling water. It sucked it right up. Then I clogged the toilet. So I figured eh screw it I'll try again. It didnt work. However we didnt use 'correct amounts' for toilets so I cant fault it for that (toilets require the whole bottle). Seems tough on shower clogs, and maybe sink clogs, but I would probably use something else for tough toilet problems. At half strength it did zero things to help my toilet, but like i said I can only fault it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Coronado

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Nothing, BUT WAIT!!! Updated 48hrs later.
customer_reviews.text: Used both chambers as instructed on a clogged bath tub. First chamber I allowed to sit for 30 minutes before pouring some boiling water in, nothing. The Second go-around I let the 2nd chamber sit for over 6 hours before pouring boiling water as instructed. Absolutely nothing happened. EDITED: So about 24 hours after the initial review it seems as though my bathroom drain did become unclogged. I'm thinking that some of the solution remained in there after the 2nd chamber pour and the boiling water. Next evening when I showered, the water was draining as normal and completely. It was previously draining super slow with about 2" of standing water taking a few hours to go away.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Marroquin

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste a CHERRY BOMB
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work on a stubborn toilet, I put all of it in went had a couple of beers 3or4 CAME back still clogged, went had more beer came back flushed half way, went had more beer looked at it went to the garage got a cherry bomb I was saving for the 4th and was about to you know, light it down the toilet, one last time, flushed it again and it worked fine, this stuff worked great just needed some time.
customer_reviews.author: VIC B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to clean out my bathroom sink that was not draining well. I had tried other natural solutions like vinegar and baking Soda but the drain remained mostly clogged. Finally when I put a bottle of this stuff down the drain and left it for an hour and then used hot water to rinse the drain finally cleared. Much cheaper than a plumber and I like that it won’t harm the eco system too. Best thing about it is that it works.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Norris

customer_reviews.title: It worked 100%
customer_reviews.text: I like this drain clog dissolver. It works well. I bought it because our shower drain was backing up with water before finished showering because of hair. Previously my husband has taken the drain cover off and cleaned out the hair with a coat hanger or something - yummy. I researched this product and it was ranked number one on a lot of websites and I also read a lot of good reviews. I emptied one bottle in the shower drain before we went to bed and the next morning there was no water backup and has been fine since. It was easy to use and had no chemical smell. I’ll always keep a bottle on hand for clogged drains.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Product actually worked!
customer_reviews.text: I actually saw a commercial for Green Gobbler on FaceBook. I hate to order from FB....I usually go right to Amazon. The product arrived in a very timely order and I used it immediately. My drain in the bathroom sink had been running slower and slower! I only used half as much as was directed, though! the directions suggested using very hot water on the product. I knew that by the time the water would get hot it would wash the drain cleaner away. Surprisingly, the product worked and, as I used my sink with increasingly hot water the clog dissolved, even with half as much product!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kleinbart

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This worked better than expected. My bathtub was draining slowly and would start to fill up half way into my shower. After reading the reviews I decided to give it a try. I first used one bottle and after 2 hours poured a big pot of boiling hot water down the drain. After reading some negative reviews I decided to use the second bottle. I poured it down, left it overnight and in the morning poured the pot of boiling water down the drain again. I immediately took a shower and it’s free and clear no slow down or back up at all. No more plunger for me, buy this thing it works!!!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen sink developed a clog that I was unable to clear with the plunger, boiling water, white vinegar, or another enzyme product. Total frustration & major inconvenience! So based on Amazon customer reviews, I ordered a bottle of Green Gobbler. The first application got rid of part of the clog, though not all, but the second one did the trick beautifully & saved me beacucoup bucks for a plumber, especially since this happened over the weekend. Now it's Monday morning, & I'm a happy camper for under $12. I'll be keeping this on hand for any future problems, believe me!
customer_reviews.author: James Lobdell

customer_reviews.title: bust that clog!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The worst thing here was waiting almost a week with a clogged sink for this to arrive. I guess amazon didn't think this was as much an emergency as I did since I could not use my kitchen sink for all that time. But wow, does this stuff work! I only used one of the portions and BAM! Clog gone! I am dancing! My kitchen is going to shine again. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: No more Clogs !!! The Best Ever ..... Go ahead buy it, you won't regret it !!!
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom sink has been clogged for 6 months. I've been trying to get maintenance to help, but at no prevail. I finally bought liquid Draino & did 3 times in 3 days & nothing !! Looking at bathroom cleaner & saw this Green Gobbler & I thought what do I have to lose at this point. I applied 1 application for 3-5 minutes as recommend following with careful use of boiling hot water, BAM there it goes !!! Unbelievable ..... I'm not even stretching the truth on this one. I honestly feel to my knees & cried & it came with another application for the tub, toilet .... exc !! Ty 😀 Sincerely, Diana Myers
customer_reviews.author: Diana Myers

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that worked & didn't smell!
customer_reviews.text: I've had issues with bathroom drains for years. I've tried so many different things - sometimes it takes multiple times before I see a difference and it's short lived or not that great. I poured one section into my drain - let it sit half a day - and drain was working like a normal drain! I was beyond excited - will admit - sent a text to a couple people sharing my excitement. And ordering more so I have it on hand for when the shower backs up or the other sink. I shed hair like a dog - and feel this is a must have. Made in the USA, No SMELLS - just added bonus'!!!
customer_reviews.author: A'me M.

customer_reviews.title: Hoping it would work, but it didn't
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would clear up clogs in my plumbing system as an alternative to the national store brands. Easy to use. Both times I ended up having to use Liquid Plumber anyway. I followed the directions for this product. When it didn't work the first time, I thought maybe the clog had been there a while and needed an extra boost to get it out and would use this when it happened again. Next clog was this past Saturday. Used as directed and thought it had cleared it. Last night discovered (in a bad way) it did't. Poured in Liquid Plumber and it took care of it quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: bmbutler

product_meta.title: Green Gobbler Drain Clog Dissolver, 31 oz
feature_bullets: DISSOLVES HAIR, SOAP, PAPER & GREASE: Forget the dirty work of plunging clogged toilets and end backed-up drains once and for all! The highly effective formula of Green Gobbler clears clogged drains and liquifies grease, hair, paper, soap scum and everything organic that‘s causing clogs within your pipes!
MAINTAINS FREE-FLOWING PIPES & DRAINS: The ultra thick formula of green gobblers hair clog remover clings to pipes to keep them free and working.
WORKS WITHIN MINUTES: Unclog drains and liquify hair within minutes! This drain opener is safe to use in pipes, toilets, sinks, tubs, and showers.
EASY AND EFFECTIVE: Annoyed of clogged and backed up drains? This drain cleaner is the simplest, and most effective way for free-flowing drains and pipes!
REVOLUTIONARY FORMULA: Green Gobbler sink cleaner is safer than using drain openers like sodium hydroxide and works faster and more effective than most other drain uncloggers on the market.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars26,535 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
